Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 44th overall pick, by Northeastern in 1970...
Injured on 6/1/1983 with a Torn Rib Cage Muscle, out for 6 weeks...
Injured on 7/23/1983 with a Concussion, out for 2 weeks...
Traded from Plum Grove to Toledo on 7/21/1985 (Going to TOL: RF G. Sanders. Going to PG: P A. Cahoon)...
Had first career hit on 4/23/1986, off Stephen Hanchett (PG)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/5/1987, off Will Armer (LP)...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Rightfield in 1987...
Injured on 6/21/1990 with a Broken Hip, out for full season...
